title: Inside DARPA: Sci-Fi Meets National Defense
description:
Explore the intersection of science fiction and national defense inside the high-tech government agency developing America’s top-secret weapons of the future with Neil deGrasse Tyson, co-host Chuck Nice, former DARPA Director Arati Prabhakar, journalist Sharon Weinberger, and roboticist Hod Lipson.
NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/all-access/inside-darpa-sci-fi-meets-national-defense/
Photo Credit: J.Krohn, courtesy of JPL-Caltech.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
